title: Dynamic Re-tasking due to Pop-up Threat
description: A flight of attack aircraft is en route to a planned target when a previously unknown mobile SAM system activates near their flight path.

tasks.description: Receive a real-time threat warning about the new SAM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator acknowledges the pop-up threat alert.

tasks.description: Immediately generate a new, safer route for the aircraft that avoids the SAM system's engagement envelope.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator quickly creates a new route that reduces risk to the aircraft.

tasks.description: Transmit the new route to the aircraft and recommend they engage their own defensive systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully re-routes the aircraft and provides a tactical recommendation.
